mapper.select: SELECT username, IF(problem_submit = 0, 0, problem_success/problem_submit) AS pass_rate, @rownum := @rownum + 1 as pass_order FROM user_info, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r ORDER BY pass_rate DESC
